verses.verse: And Eliyahyahu <S%H452><s%> the Tishbite <S%H8664><s%>, who was of the inhabitants <S%H8453><s%> of Gil`ad <S%H1568><s%>, said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Ach'av <S%H256><s%>, As the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> liveth <S%H2416><s%>, before <S%H6440><s%> whom I stand <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, there shall not be dew <S%H2919><s%> nor rain <S%H4306><s%> these years <S%H8141><s%>, but according <S%H6310><s%> to my word <S%H1697><s%>.
And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> came unto him, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Get <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thee hence, and turn <S%H6437><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee eastward <S%H6924><s%>, and hide <S%H5641><s%> <S%H8738><s%> thyself by the brook <S%H5158><s%> Cherith <S%H3747><s%>, that is before <S%H6440><s%> Yarden <S%H3383><s%>.

And it shall be, that thou shalt drink <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of the brook <S%H5158><s%>; and I have commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the ravens <S%H6158><s%> to feed <S%H3557><s%> <S%H8771><s%> thee there.

So he went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> according unto the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>: for he went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and dwelt <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> by the brook <S%H5158><s%> Cherith <S%H3747><s%>, that is before <S%H6440><s%> Yarden <S%H3383><s%>.

And the ravens <S%H6158><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8688><s%> him bread <S%H3899><s%> and flesh <S%H1320><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and bread <S%H3899><s%> and flesh <S%H1320><s%> in the evening <S%H6153><s%>; and he drank <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of the brook <S%H5158><s%>.

And it came to pass after <S%H7093><s%> a while <S%H3117><s%>, that the brook <S%H5158><s%> dried up <S%H3001><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, because there had been no rain <S%H1653><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>.
And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> came unto him, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Arise <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, get <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thee to TZarfat <S%H6886><s%>, which belongeth to Zidon <S%H6721><s%>, and dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8804><s%> there: behold, I have commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> a widow <S%H490><s%> woman <S%H802><s%> there to sustain <S%H3557><s%> <S%H8771><s%> thee.

So he arose <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to TZarfat <S%H6886><s%>. And when he came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to the gate <S%H6607><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%>, behold, the widow <S%H490><s%> woman <S%H802><s%> was there gathering <S%H7197><s%> <S%H8781><s%> of sticks <S%H6086><s%>: and he called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to her, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Fetch <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8798><s%> me, I pray thee, a little <S%H4592><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> in a vessel <S%H3627><s%>, that I may drink <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And as she was going <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to fetch <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8800><s%> it, he called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to her, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Bring <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8798><s%> me, I pray thee, a morsel <S%H6595><s%> of bread <S%H3899><s%> in thine hand <S%H3027><s%>.

And she said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, As the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> liveth <S%H2416><s%>, I have <S%H3426><s%> not a cake <S%H4580><s%>, but an handful <S%H4393><s%> <S%H3709><s%> of meal <S%H7058><s%> in a barrel <S%H3537><s%>, and a little <S%H4592><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> in a cruse <S%H6835><s%>: and, behold, I am gathering <S%H7197><s%> <S%H8781><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> sticks <S%H6086><s%>, that I may go in <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> and dress <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it for me and my son <S%H1121><s%>, that we may eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it, and die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

And Eliyahyahu <S%H452><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto her, Fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not; go <S%H935><s%> <S%H8798><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8798><s%> as thou hast said <S%H1697><s%>: but make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8798><s%> me thereof <S%H8033><s%> a little <S%H6996><s%> cake <S%H5692><s%> first <S%H7223><s%>, and bring <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8689><s%> it unto me, and after <S%H314><s%> make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for thee and for thy son <S%H1121><s%>.

For thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, The barrel <S%H3537><s%> of meal <S%H7058><s%> shall not waste <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, neither shall the cruse <S%H6835><s%> of oil <S%H8081><s%> fail <S%H2637><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, until the day <S%H3117><s%> that the YY <S%H3068><s%> sendeth <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8800><s%> rain <S%H1653><s%> upon <S%H6440><s%> the earth <S%H127><s%>.

And she went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> according to the saying <S%H1697><s%> of Eliyahyahu <S%H452><s%>: and she, and he, and her house <S%H1004><s%>, did eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> many days <S%H3117><s%>.

And the barrel <S%H3537><s%> of meal <S%H7058><s%> wasted <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not, neither did the cruse <S%H6835><s%> of oil <S%H8081><s%> fail <S%H2638><s%>, according to the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, which he spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> Eliyahyahu <S%H452><s%>.

And it came to pass after <S%H310><s%> these things <S%H1697><s%>, that the son <S%H1121><s%> of the woman <S%H802><s%>, the mistress <S%H1172><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%>, fell sick <S%H2470><s%> <S%H8804><s%>; and his sickness <S%H2483><s%> was so <S%H3966><s%> sore <S%H2389><s%>, that there was no breath <S%H5397><s%> left <S%H3498><s%> <S%H8738><s%> in him.

And she said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Eliyahyahu <S%H452><s%>, What have I to do with thee, O thou man <S%H376><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>? art thou come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto me to call <S%H2142><s%> my sin <S%H5771><s%> to remembrance <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8687><s%>, and to slay <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8687><s%> my son <S%H1121><s%> ?

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto her, Give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8798><s%> me thy son <S%H1121><s%>. And he took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him out of her bosom <S%H2436><s%>, and carried him up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8686><s%> into a loft <S%H5944><s%>, where he abode <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and laid <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him upon his own bed <S%H4296><s%>.

And he cried <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, O YY <S%H3068><s%> my 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, hast thou also brought evil <S%H7489><s%> <S%H8689><s%> upon the widow <S%H490><s%> with whom I sojourn <S%H1481><s%> <S%H8711><s%>, by slaying <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8687><s%> her son <S%H1121><s%> ?

And he stretched <S%H4058><s%> <S%H8709><s%> himself upon the child <S%H3206><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> times <S%H6471><s%>, and cried <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, O YY <S%H3068><s%> my 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, I pray thee, let this child's <S%H3206><s%> soul <S%H5315><s%> come <S%H7725><s%> into him <S%H7130><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Eliyahyahu <S%H452><s%>; and the soul <S%H5315><s%> of the child <S%H3206><s%> came <S%H7725><s%> into him <S%H7130><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and he revived <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And Eliyahyahu <S%H452><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the child <S%H3206><s%>, and brought him down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8686><s%> out of the chamber <S%H5944><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%>, and delivered <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him unto his mother <S%H517><s%>: and Eliyahyahu <S%H452><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, See <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, thy son <S%H1121><s%> liveth <S%H2416><s%>.

And the woman <S%H802><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Eliyahyahu <S%H452><s%>, Now by this <S%H2088><s%> I know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that thou art a man <S%H376><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and that the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> in thy mouth <S%H6310><s%> is truth <S%H571><s%>.
